summary: A Swedish arms dealer and a Mexican peon team up to rescue the intellectual leader of the Revolutionary cause, while taking part in numerous misadventures along the way.
cast: Franco Nero|Tomas Milian|Fernando Rey|Iris Berben|José Bódalo|Eduardo Fajardo|Karin Schubert|Gino Pernice|Álvaro de Luna|Jesús Fernández|Claudio Scarchilli|Lorenzo Robledo|Giovanni Petti|Gérard Tichy|Gianni Pulone|Jack Palance|Rafael Albaicín|Simón Arriaga|José Canalejas|Cantori Moderni Di Alessandroni|Ramón Fernández Tejela|Tito García|Víctor Israel|José Luis Lizalde|José Marco|Antonio Padilla|Joaquín Parra|Vicente Roca
title: Los compañeros
